Articles.Content:
Hellorh! It is me again! that one guy that isn't actually really active on the forums! You should totally remember me!

Anyway, vacations.

I was just on one, yay me.

7 days of hiking around Mont Blanc, that stuff was the hardest poop I ever went through.

Also got bitten by a snake, so that was a nightmare filled with antibiotics and swelling.

So I've returned to the forums now after a very nice vacation.

Have any of you guys been on any awesome vacations this year?

If so, how was it?

And if not, was there any particular place you would have liked to visit?
